title: Adult Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program through Active Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Operations and Understanding of Everyday Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: Learners participate in mobile app-based microlearning using personal smartphones/tablets and engage in weekly offline collaborative learning sessions. Mathematics is approached as a tool for solving real-life problems, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of solving everyday problems through mathematical modeling
Learners can design collaborative learning activities using mobile learning tools
Learners can demonstrate improved mathematical thinking skills through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
